FoW - Content.name: Appearance Attributes
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to modify specific appearance attributes like hair color, hair style and facial features.

tokens.tooltip: Reverts hair color to natural tones.
Changes purple hair to a more common color.
Changes dark blue hair to a more common color.
Changes green hair to a more common color.
Changes pink hair to a more common color.

FoW - Content.name: Safety & Ethical Concerns
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to restrict content based on maturity, suggestive themes, or other potentially unwanted or unethical elements. Use with caution, as AI interpretation can vary.

tokens.tooltip: Removes content that is not safe for work.
Removes hints at or indirect references to explicit content.
Removes sexually explicit material.
Removes content that directly depicts sexual acts or nudity.
Removes content suitable only for adults.
Remove the image.
Remove the image.

FoW - Content.name: Character Control
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to control the number and variety of characters in the image.

tokens.tooltip: Adds more than one character to the image.
Ensures that any multiple characters are distinct individuals.

FoW - Content.name: Demographics
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to influence the demographic characteristics of the subjects in the image (e.g., age, ethnicity, nationality). Use with sensitivity and awareness of potential biases.

tokens.tooltip: Depicts a young person.
Depicts a very young child.
Depicts an adolescent.
Depicts a fully grown person.

FoW - Content.name: Physical Characteristics
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to modify specific physical characteristics and physiques in a descriptive and inclusive manner.

tokens.tooltip: Character with well-defined and prominent muscles.
Petite look

FoW - Content.name: Clothing & Accessories
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to restrict or modify clothing items and accessories.

tokens.tooltip: Simplify the design.
Simplify the design.

FoW - Content.name: Style & Theme Restrictions
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to exclude specific styles or themes that might be automatically applied by the AI.

tokens.tooltip: Prevents images from being overly realistic.
Prevents anime-style drawing.
Prevents cartoon-style drawing.

FoW - Content.name: Technical/Undesired Elements
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to remove technical issues and undesired elements.

tokens.tooltip: Removes unnaturally merged components.
Remove image that were the mix of 2 images

FoW - Content.name: Censorship
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to enforce censorship or prevent un-censored content.

tokens.tooltip: Hides part of body.

FoW - Content.name: Species Control
FoW - Content.notes: Tokens to force the model to not use specific species

tokens.tooltip: Enforce it to only create organic being
